languages.text: {n}Вы едва можете прикоснуться к заледеневшему мужчине. Кожу жжет нестерпимый холод, и, выдержав всего несколько секунд, вы отшатываетесь назад.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы едва можете прикоснуться к заледеневшему мужчине. Кожу жжет нестерпимый холод, и, выдержав всего несколько секунд, вы отшатываетесь назад.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы едва можете прикоснуться к заледеневшему мужчине. Кожу жжет нестерпимый холод, и, выдержав всего несколько секунд, вы отшатываетесь назад.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}
{n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}
{n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}
{n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你还没有触碰到他冰冷的身体，难以忍受的寒冷便灼伤了你的皮肤。你只坚持了几秒钟，就踉踉跄跄地退了回来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你还没有触碰到他冰冷的身体，难以忍受的寒冷便灼伤了你的皮肤。你只坚持了几秒钟，就踉踉跄跄地退了回来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apenas puedes tocar su cuerpo helado. El frío insoportable quema tu piel y, al cabo de unos segundos retrocedes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apenas puedes tocar su cuerpo helado. El frío insoportable quema tu piel y, al cabo de unos segundos retrocedes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは、彼の凍った体に触れるのがやっとだった。耐え難い寒さが肌を焼き、数秒の後、よろめきながら後ずさる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは、彼の凍った体に触れるのがやっとだった。耐え難い寒さが肌を焼き、数秒の後、よろめきながら後ずさる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous parvenez à peine à toucher son corps gelé. Le froid insupportable vous brûle la peau et vous oblige à reculer au bout de quelques secondes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous parvenez à peine à toucher son corps gelé. Le froid insupportable vous brûle la peau et vous oblige à reculer au bout de quelques secondes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dir fällt es extrem schwer, seinen erfrorenen Körper zu berühren. Die unerträgliche Kälte fühlt sich an, als würde deine Haut verbrennen, und nach nur wenigen Sekunden taumelst du zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dir fällt es extrem schwer, seinen erfrorenen Körper zu berühren. Die unerträgliche Kälte fühlt sich an, als würde deine Haut verbrennen, und nach nur wenigen Sekunden taumelst du zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Buza dönmüş bedenine zar zor dokunabiliyorsun. Dayanılmaz soğuk, derini yakıyor. Yalnızca birkaç saniye dayanabildikten sonra geri çekiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can barely touch his frozen body. The unbearable cold burns your skin and, after lasting only a few seconds, you stumble back.{/n}
